00035         template
00036         <
00037                 template <class, precision> class vecTypeA,
00038                 template <class, precision> class vecTypeB,
00039                 typename T, precision P

00041         struct compute_outerProduct{};
00042 
00043         template <typename T, precision P>
00044         struct compute_outerProduct<detail::tvec2, detail::tvec2, T, P>
00045         {
00046                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static typename detail::outerProduct_trait<T, P, detail::tvec2, detail::tvec2>::type call(detail::tvec2<T, P> const & c, detail::tvec2<T, P> const & r)
00047                 {
00048                         detail::tmat2x2<T, P> m(detail::tmat2x2<T, P>::_null);
00049                         m[0][0] = c[0] * r[0];
00050                         m[0][1] = c[1] * r[0];
00051                         m[1][0] = c[0] * r[1];
00052                         m[1][1] = c[1] * r[1];
00053                         return m;
00054                 }
00055         };
00056 
00057         template <typename T, precision P>
00058         struct compute_outerProduct<detail::tvec3, detail::tvec3, T, P>
00059         {
00060                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static typename detail::outerProduct_trait<T, P, detail::tvec3, detail::tvec3>::type call(detail::tvec3<T, P> const & c, detail::tvec3<T, P> const & r)
00061                 {
00062                         detail::tmat3x3<T, P> m(detail::tmat3x3<T, P>::_null);
00063                         for(length_t i(0); i < m.length(); ++i)
00064                                 m[i] = c * r[i];
00065                         return m;
00066                 }
00067         };

00081         template <typename T, precision P>
00082         struct compute_outerProduct<detail::tvec3, detail::tvec2, T, P>
00083         {
00084                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static typename detail::outerProduct_trait<T, P, detail::tvec3, detail::tvec2>::type call(detail::tvec3<T, P> const & c, detail::tvec2<T, P> const & r)
00085                 {
00086                         detail::tmat2x3<T, P> m(detail::tmat2x3<T, P>::_null);
00087                         m[0][0] = c.x * r.x;
00088                         m[0][1] = c.y * r.x;
00089                         m[0][2] = c.z * r.x;
00090                         m[1][0] = c.x * r.y;
00091                         m[1][1] = c.y * r.y;
00092                         m[1][2] = c.z * r.y;
00093                         return m;
00094                 }
00095         };

00106                         m[1][1] = c.y * r.y;

00196         template <typename T, precision P>
00197         struct compute_transpose<detail::tmat2x2, T, P>
00198         {
00199                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static detail::tmat2x2<T, P> call(detail::tmat2x2<T, P> const & m)
00200                 {
00201                         detail::tmat2x2<T, P> result(detail::tmat2x2<T, P>::_null);
00202                         result[0][0] = m[0][0];
00203                         result[0][1] = m[1][0];
00204                         result[1][0] = m[0][1];
00205                         result[1][1] = m[1][1];
00206                         return result;
00207                 }

00345         {
00346                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static detail::tmat4x4<T, P> call(detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m)
00347                 {

00349                         result[0][0] = m[0][0];
00350                         result[0][1] = m[1][0];

00352                         result[0][3] = m[3][0];

00356                         result[1][2] = m[2][1];

00361                         result[2][2] = m[2][2];
00362                         result[2][3] = m[3][2];

00364                         result[3][0] = m[0][3];
00365                         result[3][1] = m[1][3];

00372         template <template <class, precision> class matType, typename T, precision P>
00373         struct compute_determinant{};
00374 
00375         template <typename T, precision P>
00376         struct compute_determinant<detail::tmat2x2, T, P>
00377         {
00378                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static T call(detail::tmat2x2<T, P> const & m)
00379                 {
00380                         return m[0][0] * m[1][1] - m[1][0] * m[0][1];
00381                 }
00382         };
00383 
00384         template <typename T, precision P>
00385         struct compute_determinant<detail::tmat3x3, T, P>
00386         {
00387                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static T call(detail::tmat3x3<T, P> const & m)
00388                 {
00389                         return
00390                                 + m[0][0] * (m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2])
00391                                 - m[1][0] * (m[0][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[0][2])
00392                                 + m[2][0] * (m[0][1] * m[1][2] - m[1][1] * m[0][2]);
00393                 }
00394         };
00395 
00396         template <typename T, precision P>
00397         struct compute_determinant<detail::tmat4x4, T, P>
00398         {
00399                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static T call(detail::tmat4x4<T, P> const & m)
00400                 {
00401                         T SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00402                         T SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00403                         T SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00404                         T SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00405                         T SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00406                         T SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00407 
00408                         detail::tvec4<T, P> DetCof(
00409                                 + (m[1][1] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor01 + m[1][3] * SubFactor02),
00410                                 - (m[1][0] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor04),
00411                                 + (m[1][0] * SubFactor01 - m[1][1] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor05),
00412                                 - (m[1][0] * SubFactor02 - m[1][1] * SubFactor04 + m[1][2] * SubFactor05));
00413 
00414                         return
00415                                 m[0][0] * DetCof[0] + m[0][1] * DetCof[1] +
00416                                 m[0][2] * DetCof[2] + m[0][3] * DetCof[3];
00417                 }
00418         };
00419 }//namespace detail
00420 
00421         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class matType>
00422         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER matType<T, P> matrixCompMult(matType<T, P> const & x, matType<T, P> const & y)
00423         {
00424                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'matrixCompMult' only accept floating-point inputs");
00425 
00426                 matType<T, P> result(matType<T, P>::_null);
00427                 for(length_t i = 0; i < result.length(); ++i)
00428                         result[i] = x[i] * y[i];
00429                 return result;
00430         }
00431 
00432         template<typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecTypeA, template <typename, precision> class vecTypeB>
00433         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename detail::outerProduct_trait<T, P, vecTypeA, vecTypeB>::type outerProduct(vecTypeA<T, P> const & c, vecTypeB<T, P> const & r)
00434         {
00435                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'outerProduct' only accept floating-point inputs");
00436                 return detail::compute_outerProduct<vecTypeA, vecTypeB, T, P>::call(c, r);
00437         }

00439         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class matType>
00440         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER typename matType<T, P>::transpose_type transpose(matType<T, P> const & m)
00441         {
00442                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'transpose' only accept floating-point inputs");
00443                 return detail::compute_transpose<matType, T, P>::call(m);
00444         }

00446         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class matType>
00447         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T determinant(matType<T, P> const & m)
00448         {
00449                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'determinant' only accept floating-point inputs");
00450                 return detail::compute_determinant<matType, T, P>::call(m);
00451         }

00453         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class matType>
00454         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER matType<T, P> inverse(matType<T, P> const & m)
00455         {
00456                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'inverse' only accept floating-point inputs");
00457                 return detail::compute_inverse<matType, T, P>::call(m);
00458         }
